name: ChristianLifeRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask christian life radio what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask christian life radio to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christian life radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Christian Life Radio helps you to live life through a mix of “Light & Easy Music” from 5 decades along with a mix of Inspirational Messages. Part of “The Christian Music Preservation Project”. Here you can find hope, comfort and encouragement through our programming. CLR offers a wide variety of music from a mix of genres that serves as a showcase for the Preservation Project that reaches every country and territory in the world with a large listener base.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
